OOC: Damn you to hell, Slawdogg! I am serious! Dcoburn's comment also had
nothing to do with you, but you, being a retard who has to bitch about
everything, just had to try and prove yourslef superior. Yeah, yeah, JP
moded. Whoopee! He modes all of the time. While I personally don't hate you
as much as JP, you should practice what you preach, Slawdogg.

Soulstice Omega
